name: [Allegiance]
description: This unit is either a Loyalist or a Traitor, and all models in the army must be from the same Allegiance

name: [Legiones Astartes]
description: This unit is considered to be of a specific Legion, and all units selected as part of a given Detachment must have the same [Legiones Astartes] Trait.

name: Legiones Astartes (Iron Warrior)
description: This unit is considered to be of the Iron Warriors Legion, and all units selected as part of a given Detachment must have the Iron Warriors Trait.

name: Master of the Legion
description: May select a Rite of War. May select one Apex Detachment.

name: Smokescreen
description: This does something with smoke.

name: Same Faction
description: Must be the same Faction as the Primary Detachment.

name: Points Limit
description: May only be selected in a 3,000 Point+ Army.

name: Any Faction
description: May be of any Faction.

name: Must be a different Faction than Primary
description: Must be a different Faction than Primary.

name: May include Auxillary Detachments
description: May include Auxillary Detachments.

name: Armourbane
description: A Weapon with the Armourbane Special Rule counts Glancing Hits as Penetrating Hits.

name: Assault Vehicle
description: A Vehicle with this Special Rule allows Models to Disembark and Charge without penalty.

name: Auto-repair (X)
description: A Model with this Special Rule has a bonus to Repair Tests to remove Statuses.

name: Barrage (X)
description: A Weapon with this Special Rule may be used to attack Target Units out of Line of Sight.

name: Battlesmith (X)
description: A Model with the Battlesmith (X) Special Rule can repair Vehicles, Automata and other mechanical Units.

name: Blast (X)
description: Attacks made with the Blast (X) Special Rule use a Blast Marker to determine how many Hits are caused.

name: Breaching (X)
description: With a Weapon that has the Breaching (X) Special Rule there is a chance that a Wound Test may result I nthe Wound ignoring Armour Saves.

name: Bulky (X)
description: Models with the Bulky (X) Special Rule take up more space on Transport Models.

name: Critical Hit (X)
description: Attacks made with the Critical Hit (X) Special Rule have a chance to automatically cause a wound and inflict 1 extra point of damage.

name: Deep Strike
description: The Deep Strike Special Rule allows a Unit to enter play anywhere on the Battlefield.

name: Deflagrate (X)
description: Unsaved Wounds inflicted by attacks with the Deflagrate (X) Special Rule can cause additional Hits.

name: Detonation
description: Weapons with this Special Rule can only attack Vehicles and immobile Models.

name: Duellist's Edge (X)
description: A Weapon with the Duellist's Edge (X) Special Rule grants a bonus to Focus Rolls in Challenges.

name: Eternal Warrior (X)
description: A Model with this Special Rule takes less Damage from attacks.

name: Expendable (X)
description: A Player scores less Victory Points when they destroy a Unit that includes only Models with this Special Rule.

name: Explodes (X)
description: A Model with this Special Rule can explode and cause Hits to nearby Models and Units.

name: Fast (X)
description: A Unit that only includes Mmodels with the Fast (X) Special Rule gains a bonus to Rush and Charge Moves.

name: Fear (X)
description: Models near an enemy Model with the Fear (X) Special Rule must reduce their Advanced Characteristics.

name: Feel No Pain (X)
description: Feel No Pain (X) is a Damage Mitigation Test that may be taken in addition to a Saving Throw.

name: Firing Protocols (X)
description: A Model with the Firing Protocols (X) Special Rule may attack with more than one ranged weapon.

name: Force (X)
description: A Weapon with this Special Rule may double a Characteristic with a Willpower Check, but may suffer Perils of the Warp.

name: Hatred (X)
description: The Hatred (X) Special Rule grants bonuses against enemies of a specific Faction, Type or Trait.

name: Heavy (X)
description: Weapons with the Heavy (X) Special Rule gain _1 to a Characteristic when Stationary.

name: Heedless
description: A Unit that includes any Models with this Special Rule cannot claim Objectives.

name: Impact (X)
description: On a successful Charge, a Model with the Impact (X) Special Rule temporarily increases a Characteristic by 1.

name: Infiltrate (X)
description: Models with the Infiltrate (X) Special Rule can deploy outside of their Deployment Zone.

name: Light Transport
description: Models with this Special Rule cannot carry models with the Bulky (X) Special Rule.

name: Limited (X)
description: A Weapon with the Limited (X) Special Rule can only be used to attack a limited number of times per Battle.

name: Line (X)
description: A Unit of Models with this Special Rule can control Objectives more easily and scores more Victory Points from controlling an Objective.

name: Move Through Cover
description: The Move Through Cover Special Rule allows the penalties of terrain to be ignored.

name: Officer of the Line (X)
description: Models with this Special Rule allow more Auxillary Detachments to be included in an Army.

name: Ordnance (X)
description: Weapons with the Ordnance (X) Special Rule double the value of a Characteristic when Stationary.

name: Outflank
description: A Unit of Models with the Outflank Special Rule can enter play from outside of Deployment Zones.

name: Panic (X)
description: Weapons and other attacks that have the Panic (X) Special Rule have a chance of inflicting the Routed Status on the Target Unit.

name: Phage (X)
description: Unsaved Wounds with the Phage (X) Special Rule reduce a Characteristic by 1.

name: Pinning (X)
description: Weapons and other attacks that have the Pinning (X) Special Rule have a chance of inflicting the Pinned Status on the Target Unit.

name: Pistol
description: A Model may attack with two Weapons that have the Pistol Special Rule.

name: Poisoned (X)
description: A Weapon with the Poisoned (X) Special Rule has a chance to cause a wound regardless of the target's Toughness.

name: Precision (X)
description: Attacks made with the Precision (X) Special Rule are allocated by the Attacking Player, not the Defender.

name: Reaping Blow (X)
description: If a Model with this Special Rule is outnumbered, it gains extra attacks.

name: Rending (X)
description: With a Weapon that has the Rending (X) Special Rule, there is a chance that a Hit Test may result in an automatic wound.

name: Shock (X)
description: Weapons with the Shock (X) Special Rule have a chance of inflicting Statuses on Vehicles even if it does not penetrate their armour.

name: Shread (X)
description: Attacks made with the Shread (X) Special Rule can sometimes inflict an extra point of damage.

name: Shrouded (X)
description: Shrouded (X) is a Damage Migration Test that may be taken in addition to a Saving Throw.

name: Skyfire
description: Attacks made with the Skyfire Special Rule ignore penalties when attacking Flyers.

name: Stun (X)
description: Weapons and other attacks that have the Stun (X) Special Rule have a chance of inflicting the Stunned Status on the Target Unit.

name: Support Unit (X)
description: A Unit that includes Models with this Special Rule scores fewer Victory Points for controlling Objective Markers.

name: Suppressive (X)
description: Weapons and other attacks that have the Suppressive (X) Special Rule have a chance of inflicting the Suppressed Status on the Target Unit.

name: Template
description: Weapons and attacks with the Template Special Rule use the Flame Template to determine how many Models they Hit.

name: Vanguard (X)
description: A Unit that includes Models with this Special Rule scores fewer Victory Points for controlling Objectives, but can score Victory Points for destroying enemy Units that hold Objectives.

name: Overload (X)
description: With a Weapon that has the Overload (X) Special Rule, there is a chance that a Hit Test may result in an automatic wound to the user.
